reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 119/06: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2006 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314, 329.1 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TIME LIMITS FOR 2006 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314, 329.1 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 119/06: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2006 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314, 329.1 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. (1) The time limits for 2006 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2006. O. Reg. 119/06, s. 1. (2) Despite subsection (1), the time limit for 2006 under subsection 329.1 (2) of the Act is extended to September 30, 2006 for the Town of Northeastern Manitoulin and the Islands and the Township of Terrace Bay. O. Reg. 404/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The time limits for 2006 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2006. O. Reg. 119/06, s. 1.

(2) Despite subsection (1), the time limit for 2006 under subsection 329.1 (2) of the Act is extended to September 30, 2006 for the Town of Northeastern Manitoulin and the Islands and the Township of Terrace Bay. O. Reg. 404/06, s. 1.
